title: Does riot give birthday presents? or a skin for someones birthday
body:
its my birthday today and i was questioning if riot gives birthday presents. If so  gift me radiant Wukong plez :3



Don't flame me or say mean comments I know yalls got back from a bad game.

replies.body: this is my twitter btw and yes i have a league account called Monto816 which is my main account.
Ayyyyyy that's a nice poro! make sure to double check your rp totals next time you login.
